article_title: Coal miners’ benefits under threat after CONSOL letter

article_metadata.author:
GREG JORDAN
Bluefield Daily Telegraph

og.description: More than 100 retired miners crowded into a local restaurant Wednesday to tell one of their congressional representatives about being informed that they were losing promised healthcare benefits.
